Those convicted by the courts for their actions in the riots should be dealt with firmly
1) if they are not a British National they should be returned to their country of origin and not allowed to return to the UK, this includes EU nationals.
2) if they are British citizens they should not be allowed to lavish in our over crowded prisons at the expense of the tax payer, they should be made to work for at least 12 months in the communities they have committed their crime in.
3) If they are under the age of 16 parents should be held accoutable and questioned by social services to their ability to parent.
